sections.text:
44-8103.Applicability of act; rules and regulations.

(1) The Nebraska Protection in Annuity Transactions Act applies to any recommendation or sale of an annuity.

(2) The Director of Insurance may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Nebraska Protection in Annuity Transactions Act.

SourceLaws 2006, LB 875, ยง 15;Laws 2007, LB117, ยง 28;Laws 2012, LB887, ยง 23;Laws 2021, LB22, ยง 2.
